title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones
resume: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones is an American documentary television series airing on Investigation Discovery, hosted by Aphrodite Jones. The show is very similar in format to On the Case with Paula Zahn. The series has been renewed for a fourth season.
